ast.name: Music shortcuts
ast.comment:
Pin Albums shortcut to start to go directly to the albums list with a single tap. Or pin Play all shortcut to start to play all of the songs in the library in repeat+shuffle mode. The script also contains a revised version of my previous Playlist editor with a lightweight scrollable GUI and some other improvements.

Hints:
• Use search button on the wall to find what you are searching for faster than by scrolling
• Playlist editor will only switch tracks when running in the foreground: TouchDevelop must be open and running this script and the screen should not be locked
• Advanced editor allows to see playlist contents and append more tracks to the existing playlists
• In advanced mode tapping two songs, one by one, causes them to be swapped in the list
• In advanced mode tapping a song twice causes it to be removed from the list
• Advanced mode can be slow for playlists with more than 15 items.

body.text: Pin to start to go straight to the list of albums in the library.
Allows listing, reordering as well as appending and removing tracks. May be a bit slow for playlists with more than 15 items.
Pin to start and tap to have all tracks in the library played with repeat and shuffle on.
Pin to start to go straight to the list of playlists synched from Zune into the library. (not the ones created by the script)
